title: Forearmed (6U16)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Skirmish: Reveal the top card of your draw deck to make a minion skirmishing an Elf strength -X, where X is the twilight cost of the revealed card.
Lore:	”'Give them a volley.'”
Rarity:	U
